mapper.select: select * from goods_tb where (g_status='판매' or g_status='구매') and loc_seq in (select loc_seq from g_location_tb where v_machine_seq=2) order by loc_seq asc
select g.g_seq, g.g_name, g.g_img, g.g_price, g.seller_id, u.user_id, u.user_point from goods_tb g, user_tb u where g.seller_id = u.user_id and g_seq = #{g_seq}
select g.g_seq, g.g_name, g.g_img as g_img, g.g_price, l.v_machine_pw, l.v_machine_space_no from goods_tb g, g_location_tb l where g.loc_seq = l.loc_seq and g_seq = #{g_seq}
select g.g_seq, l.v_machine_pw from goods_tb g, g_location_tb l where g.loc_seq = l.loc_seq and g.g_seq = #{g_seq}
